I wanted Lisa to suffer for all that she had done to me and my friends but I did not want to push things so far that I become like her, that was the last thing I wanted. I decided to give mom a reason why my sister was acting like a baby. I grabbed today's paper and used the remote to change the front page headline with something that would both help Lisa and scare the pants off her as well.

"Mommy, there's a scary article on the front page today." I said, sounding frightened. "It has to do with that energy drink Lisa has been downing like crazy lately."

Mom looked at me, her anger not quite spent. "What!?" she asked, snapping. "If this is a joke..."

She looked at the paper and quickly turned pale then showed it to Lisa, who turned even more pale. The headline read:

POPULAR ENERGY DRINK CAUSING MENTAL AND PHYSICAL REGRESSION IN LOCAL TEENAGERS!

"How long have you been drinking that stuff!?" mom asked Lisa, her anger fading.

Lisa swallowed hard, terrified. "For weeks." she replied, shaken. "My friends have been drinking it too!"

Realizing that you would have to do the same to Lisa's friends you discretely took the remote from your little purse, where you had kept it, and worked the proper commands before replacing it, unseen, as mom sighed.

"I'm sorry I lost it with you, Lisa." she said, much calmer. "I will look deeper into this but until we can find a way to fix this problem, you are staying in those diapers at all times."

Lisa opened her mouth to protest but mom cut her off. "I am not going to be washing sheets morning noon and night while you have this problem!" she snapped. "You are staying in those diapers and that is final! If I catch you not wearing them before we resolve this issue, I will treat you like a baby as well!"

I struggled not to laugh at that, imagining Lisa having to literally act like a baby, though that is what I intended for her, one step at a time until the 'effects' of the bad drinks wore off in say a month or two....

"I think Lisa needs to start regressing a little, just to really terrify her." I thought.

A moment later, I heard Lisa screaming and put the remote back in my purse before dashing back in to see her slowly shrinking, the diaper falling off of her, leaving her completely naked where she stood.

"Mom!... MOM!!" screamed Lisa, hysterical. "I... I'm SHRINKING!!" she gasped for air as her sheer panic made it hard to breathe. "Help... Help me!! Do something, anything!!"

"DO WHAT, LISA!?!" asked mom, just as panicked. "I can't do anything until you stop shrinking!"

Lisa screamed, seeing her boobs grow smaller as she regressed further in age. "No, my babies!" she screamed, obviously proud of her well endowed nature. "I don't want to be little again!"

I covered my mouth, blushing as I watched Lisa helplessly grow smaller and smaller. Fortunately, I made the shrinking painless, I could have left her screaming in agony, her bones cracking and her body shifting, until she reached her new age, set by me.

Finally, Lisa stopped shrinking and she looked at her new body, horrified. She was completely flat and a lot lighter as easily hoisted her onto the kitchen table and turned to me.

"Matthew, could you please bring me the baby bag I use when I baby sit little Sarah, next door."

My eyes nearly popped out of my head as I ran from the room, giggling. Sarah Lore live next door to us, mom babysat her several time. She was ten years old with a bladder control issue and had to wear diapers 24/7 until her doctor could help her strengthen her bladder muscles. I grabbed the bag and ran into the kitchen where mom thanked me then had me help diaper Lisa. It was a dream come true, seeing Lisa, lying there, helpless and crying from humiliation. I fought the urge to laugh as I closed the diaper around her.

"One more thing." said mom. "These are lockable diapers and I will lock them if you try to take them off, is that clear?"

Lisa nodded, not wanting mom to do that to her, ever.

"We will find a cure for you, Lisa." promised mom. "At least now, I can use regular baby items on you."

Once Lisa's new diaper was on, mom put her back onto her feet on the kitchen floor where Lisa looked up at me, literally.

"Hello, my big, little sister." I teased, grinning.

Mom covered her mouth, trying not to laugh.

Chuckerling you decided to give her baby Colic, although it wasn't technicly a illnes it was still very embarising. You pointed at her and woosh she had it.

(note for those of of you who don't know what baby Colic is here is a discription from http://www.askbaby.com/ [go there if you want to know anything about babys and young kids]
Every baby cries, but babies who cry for more than three hours a day for more than three days a week may have colic. A baby with colic will cry uncontrollably, despite being healthy and well fed. Colic is a harmless condition, although it can be very upsetting for parents or carers.

About one fifth of babies get colic, and it equally affects boys and girls, first born children and those born later. In general, it appears at around two to four weeks of age and can last for three months, or longer in some cases.

The cause of colic is unknown, however there are ways to help calm your baby down. In the past colic was thought to be related to the digestive system. However, although painful abdominal gas may contribute to colic, there is little evidence to prove it's due to gastrointestinal problems.

Another possible cause of colic is a combination of the baby's temperament and an immature nervous system. The baby's temperament may make him or her highly sensitive to the environment, and he or she may react to normal stimulation or changes to the environment by crying. Because the baby's nervous system is immature, he or she is unable to regulate crying once it starts.

The main symptom of colic is continuous crying for long periods of time. Although this crying can occur at any time, it is usually worse in the evening. Although colic is not thought to be due to pain, a baby with colic may look uncomfortable or appear to be in pain. Babies may lift their head, draw their legs up to their tummy, become red in the face and pass wind. Some babies refuse to eat. Difficulty falling and staying asleep is also common.

Normally, colic is not a serious condition. Research shows that babies with colic continue to eat and gain weight normally, despite the crying. The main problem with the condition is the stress and anxiety it creates within the home. Parents and other family members may find it difficult to cope with the constant crying, so it's important to have support and to take a break now and then.

Colic does not need medical treatment. However, any parent or carer who is worried about their baby's crying may want to get advice from a healthcare professional to make sure there is no serious problem.Before visiting a doctor, all other possible causes of crying should be eliminated. These include, hunger, tiredness, lack of contact, temperature or pain.

If your baby is diagnosed with colic there are many things parents can do to help the baby, and themselves. Though there is no single medicine or proven cure for colic, there are several measures that may help. Different babies are comforted by different measures, and parents usually need to try various methods to see what works.
Parents who bottle-feed their babies may want to try a different formula.


Parents who breastfeed their babies should continue to do so as weaning the baby from breast milk may make the colic worse.


Some women find that certain foods in their diet seem to make colic worse and they may find that cutting these foods out helps. These might include vegetables such as cabbage, broccoli, cauliflower, sprouts, parsnips, onions, or beans, garlic, apricots, melon, spicy foods, caffeine and alcohol. By reintroducing foods gradually, you may be able to identify which food, if any, is causing the problem.


If there is a family history of milk sugar (lactose) intolerance, breastfeeding mothers could try eliminating cows milk from their diet. Sometimes babies are not able to digest lactose well, but this improves as they get older.


Some parents who bottle-feed their baby try changing over to soya-based formula, but there is no evidence that this is effective at reducing colic.


If your baby seems to have a lot of wind, make sure he or she is burped frequently. Babies who are bottle-fed may swallow air from the bottle so try feeding the baby in a different position, or using a bottle and teat designed to reduce the amount of air the baby swallows during a feed. These include curved bottles, bottles with a collapsible bag inside or bottles with a vent.
To soothe babies with colic, the following techniques may be helpful:
carry the baby in a front sling or back pack


wrap him or her snugly in a blanket (this is called swaddling)


keep the baby moving in a baby swing


place him or her near continuous noise or vibrations from household appliances like the dishwasher, vacuum cleaner or washer-dryer


take him or her for a car ride or a walk outside


give him or her a dummy to suck on


give him or her tummy or back rubs


take a shower together as the warm water may be comforting
There are no medicines used to treat colic. However there are things which may help to relieve abdominal symptoms. It may be worth trying "colic drops" or "gripe water", which are available without a prescription.

Having a colicky baby can be very stressful, frustrating and challenging for any parent, particularly if it is the first child. Babies may pick up on anxiety around them, and this may make colic worse. It's important for the parents or carer to have time to themselves. Parents who feel overwhelmed should take a break. Ask a partner or friend to take over for a while, even for an hour or two.

153122222212222122.title: Make Claire Lisa's Babysitter Part Two: The Trip

1531222222122221221.content:
The next morning your parents left, and you were all there to say good bye, Lisa was still shocked at them leaving Claire in charge, however you were already made plans to keep the balance in your favour, foretunetly for you Lisa was a predictable person, however before you could relax, there was still work to do. You turned to Claire,

"Commoneo" you said, she stopped, "follow me" you whispered and the two of you snuck back into the house, you then briefed her on your plan, and made sure everything was clearly understood, now you could sit back and relax, "Ovlivio" you said, Claire looked confused for a momment when you, but before she could do anything, you started talking.

"By the way Claire, here is mom's list of rules" Claire took the list off you, and you ran off. Lisa was walking down the hallway towards the door, when Claire shouted, "and where do you think your going?" "to meet my friends" Lisa shouted back, "no your not, you have homework to do," Claire replied, Lisa stopped short, before turning and walking up to Claire.

Claire was only just above average height at five foot seven, so she had crane her neck, to keep eye contance with Lisa, but despite this she stood her ground. "Listen," Lisa, "I don't care that mom, left you in charge, as far as I concerned I don't have to listen to you, if you cross me, then I'll make you regret it, got it? so quit bugging me."

Claire started back with a equally tough look, "no you listen, I'm in charge, and that means that you do have to obey me, now get off your high horse, and get on with your home work," she took a brief pause before putting special enphasis on her last words "Little girl." You gulped, looking at Lisa, it looked like she was going to break Claire in two, and use her ribs as tooth pics.

And that was something you couldn't allow, you pointed at Lisa, and concentrated, Lisa paused, before backing away, "you can't make me do it" she said, before turning to leave. "aren't you forgeting something?"Clair said, lisa looked down, and saw her bag was missing, she walked into her room, frantically she looked around, but her bag was no where to be seen.

She groaned, and went for her purse, only to discover it was empty, after looking around, she found that she could not find hide nor hair of her money, nor for that matter could she find her car keys, it looked like she would have to brodern her search range, that would take a while, and it looked like she would be late, "I best call and say I'm going to be late" she muttered to herself.

But then she discovered she couldn't find her phone, starting to worry, she decied to send them a email, foretunetly her computer was still there, she sat down and tried to log in, only to find that it would not except her password, she was perplexed at what was going on, when suddenly it hit her, she turned and stormed out of her room.

She found Claire still standing across the hallway looking at her with glee, "I see you found out about that" Claire chuckled, "where's my stuff?" Lisa screamed, "I hid a lot of your things, don't worry your get them back, if you behave yourself." Claire chuckled and started to walk off, Lisa would have torn he limb from limb, but you interfered, and lisa sadly admited defeat, and went to do her home work.

You smiled, now the real fun begins...
1531222222122221221.title: Part Three: The Fun Begins

15312222221222212211.content:
You smiled coldly, everything was going to plan, now that Claire had control over Lisa, you decided it was time to insiate part four of your plan, you smiled, Claire was perfect at this, she naturally hated Lisa, almost as much as you did, the two had been battling for the title of Alpha Female, since before you were born, and now you had harnessed her evil, and redirected it, in a possitive way.

When this was over, you would have to release Claire, still you would have a little more fun before then, and then you would be sastisfied to continue your life, you just had to keep a careful eye on this power, you couldn't let it go to your head, other wise you might end up like Lisa, and that was something, that would haunt you to your grave.

But now it was time for dinner, and Claire had cooked, Lisa groaned, as she sat there, Claire had been practising her power over her, the whole evening, and having a good ammount of fun in the proccess, and by now Lisa was little less than a smoking volcano, that could erupt at any moment, you had to keep a careful eye on her,

If she did blow, and did something that you would regret, your whole plan would fall into ruin, and that was something that you could not allow to happen, so when ever Lisa got to steamed under the collar, you were there to lower her temperature, and keep her temper in check, but it was exausting, even with the power to warp time, space, matter, energy, mind and reality, there were limits to what you could do, and Lisa's temper was testing these limits.

Claire carried the plates in, and placed them on the table, the three of you sat down and started to eat, Lisa looked at the food with disgust, but as she was so hungry, she continued to eat, Claire had made sure she hadn't eaten a single thing since she had got here this morning, so that she wouldn't complain about dinner,

You looked at Claire, although you had her in your power, you had allowed her a large ammount of free will, as she hated Lisa, and was enjoying her power over her, as you hated Lisa, you did not mind this, but it was getting, really tiering, so you sat back and relaxed, while you ate dinner. Lisa didn't like lettace so she had eaten her lettace.

Claire noticing this, instantly desided to exploit it, she stood up and walked over to her "now now lisa" she cooed, "I know they taste icky, but you have to eat them if you want to grow up big and strong" she then gave a laugh, now this was to much, Lisa stood up and turned to her, Claire kept her ground, but you knew where this was going.

But you were to tired to stop Lisa, Panicing you pointed at Claire, and with that Claire turned and walked back to her seat, and sat down, Lisa continued to stair at her, but soon sat back down, and continued to eat, that was too close, you had to be more careful, but this constant use of your power had left you nackered, you got up and turned to walk to bed,

But before you did, you performed one final use of your power, you pointed at Lisa, you need to keep with the plan, or else it would all be for nothing, before crawling up the stairs to bed, it was only five, but you were to tired to care, you were asleep in minutes. A scream woke you up, looking at your clock it was ten in the morning.

You smiled and streched, feeling completely revived, you clicked your fingers and appeared down stairs, now exactly what had happen, you got to Lisa's door, just in time to see Claire clicking her phone, as she took a photo, Lisa had wet her bed, just as you had made her, this event had clearly shocked her, Claire however was making the most of it.

"Now Lisa" she said, "I know, you being a little girl, sometimes find it hard, to control your tiny bladder, but we can't have you wetting your self, now can we?" she waved her hand, as if scolding a child, Lisa was too shocked however to respond, "so if this happens again, I will be forced to put you in diapers, understood? Good, now lets get you cleaned up."

Claire grabbed Lisa's hand and led her off, and you could help laugh, now the stage was set, it was time for the next and final act...

1541122122111.title: Her room had completely changed

15411221221112.content:
Somewhere in Lisa's mind, long distant cogs started to turn, and ideas started run through her head, it was clear that her brother was going to back down, and it was clear that something was wrong with what was happening, how could all these things happening, there was something strange going on around here, and if she was going to find out what, then she would have to find out a bit more about what was going on, but to do that she would have to get Matt off her tail.

She smiled, and then sighed, "Ok big brovr" she said, trying to sound as childish as she could, "I know, i just wsh, I was oldr" she said sadly, "there there," Matt said, "You will be, it will just take a few years," the two of you hugged and Matt left, 'wow' he thought, 'I did a better job than I thought,' Meanwhile back in her room, Lisa smiled,

Not that she had successfully fooled her brother, now she could find out what was going on, carefully she crept out of her room, and down the stairs, Matt was sitting down watching the TV, Lisa crept up behind a giant plant, and hid there, closely she watched Matt, Matt at this point was feeling a little thirsty, it occurred to him, now that he had illuminated his Lisa problem, he was free to use his powers however he wanted.

Smiling he clicked his fingers, and a drink appeared on the table next to him, Lisa gasped, where had that drink come from, Matt grabbed the drink and took a swig, only to spit it out, it had no taste, he groaned, apparently making modern soft drinks, was too complicated, after all, he knew he had to understand, at least to some degree what he was creating was made of for it to work, so it appeared that the chemicals in this made it too difficult to replicate.

Matt sighed, he would have to work on that, he flicked his wrist and the bottle disappeared, and again Lisa gasped, then again, maybe not being completely omnipotent would be a good thing, after all, it occurred to Matthew that now that he was almost all powerful, it was possible that he would lose his sense of humanity, he knew he couldn't let that happen.

But then again he was still thirsty and he still needed a drink, Matt sighed and waved his hand, and in the kitchen the fridge door opened and a nice cold drink floated out of it through the air towards him,

Lisa was flappergast, how could Matt do all that, it was like he had gained, some great power, so that was how all this had happened, she had to get out of here and find a way to undo it, quietly she turned round and started to sneak off, only for her arm to hit a nick nack, it fell, and hit the ground with a thump.
Matt jumped to his feet, Lisa turned and ran towards the door, Matt pointed and the door disappeared, a brick wall replacing it, he then beckoned with his other hand, and Lisa found herself sliding across the floor towards him,

She tried to run away but she couldn’t, she stopped directly in front of him, Matt waved his hands, chains shot out of the walls, they grabbed Lisa by the limbs, and hoisted her into the air, before pulling her against the wall,

Matt slowly walked up to her, “so you know?” he said coldly, “I know everything, how you gained great power, and how you used it to try and trick me into thinking I was a little kid,” Lisa shouted back,

Matt sighed, he had been afraid of this, as everyone knew the human mind was highly complicated, and acted in strange ways, apparently his regressing Lisa’s mind, had caused it to form new neural pathways, and this had somehow, made a girl with under average intelligence, a girl with just above average intelligence, she had tricked him.

And something about that, made you mad, “now get me down, or I will tell mom, about all your events, and then were see what happens,” Lisa shouted, silence fell, it seemed Lisa was unaware of your rage.

Silence continued, then Lisa said, “well what are you waiting for?” and suddenly all sound stopped, the clocks stopped ticking, the birds stopped singing, even the wind stopped whistling, there was complete silence in the room,

And then you spoke, “Fourteen years” you said coldly, there was a slight shaking sensation, it was like the room was experiencing a mini earthquake, the crockery shook slightly breaking the silence, “Fourteen miserable years” you said even colder,

The shaking was getting stronger, “Fourteen years, my whole life has been a story of sadness, embarrassment and pain,” you said, the lights started to flicker, the shaking had gotten greater, the crockery was shaking vigorously now, as it got closer and closer to the edge,

“Fourteen years, fourteen years of terror, of pain, of of misery,” the strange events stopped for a moment and again there was silence, “and you know what?” you said, “IT WAS ALL BECAUSE OF YOU” you screamed,

The plate fell off the dresser and smashed, and all hell broke loose, light bulbs exploded, plates and dishes flew across the room, the whole place shook, cracks appeared in the walls, fire burst up from the floor around you,

“All these years you have made me feel awful” you shouted, “But now, all that is over, because, I’m all powerful,” as you shouted the last part the flames shot up to the celling, casting your silhouette onto the wall,

“you thought it was funny to torment me, let’s see how you like it,” you said, and you pointed at the clocks, a green bolt of lightning shot out of your hand and hit it, and with that they started to tick backwards,

First slowly, then it got faster and faster, and as it did, Lisa began to feel its effects, she was becoming smaller and younger, frantically she started to squirm, “no you can’t do this” she screamed, she looked like she was about your age,

As soon as she was small enough, she escaped from the chains and tried to run, but with every step it got harder, she was about eight now, panicking she tried to run faster, but still she was getting younger, she looked no older than three now, and still she got younger,

She was feet away from the door, but it was already too late, Lisa fell forward, she could no longer walk, she tried to crawl, but it was too late, her time was up, the clock hit twelve, and with every stroke Lisa’s Memory was erased, by the time it hit twelve Lisa Martin as the world had come to know here, no longer existed, and in her place was an adorable little baby,

Matt walked over and picked her up, “don’t worry” He said comfortingly, “I promise to be a better brother, than you were a sister…”

You paused to catch your breath "Now think about exactly what I could make you think, if you made me angry enough to do so." you smiled leaving her in suspence "theris Necklass also has a cool reality warping abbility, so if I order you to do somethin impossible or atleast difficult, it can make you do it, now isn't that exciting."You paused an walked up close to her, so you were righ in your face, she was looking very scared by now.

"You spent years forcing me, so now I can get revenge, i wouldn't give me that much reason to, now if you play along, I'm willing to be nice, and Not force you to do to many too humilating things a week or so, but if you anger me, well I'll leave it to your imagination what I would do, as right now, I have no limits, thjere is nothing I can't do, adn further more, after all these years of suffering from you, there is nothing I won't do!"

You came out, and gave her a few minutes to process this, and let her imagination cook up some horrible images, before saying "now thats clear, lets begin, with you...

Then suddenly the hair started to grow, and next to it, more hairs began to grow, untill lisa's whole hair appeared there floating in mid air, and then as I watched, the rest of Lisa's head began to form, first it looked like a skin coloured orb, but then it started to carve its self itself, and holes began to form, then her skin expanded ed forming a nose and lips, her lips turned red, adn eye balls formed in the mmpty sockets, ears streached out of her head.

This Lisa also didnot have any of the memories of the he horrors th ereal lis a had coaused, instead she had alternative memoris, of her always being a surpotive, kind hearted, helpful, pushover of a sister, who could not resist doing near anything that her little brother asked her, if he tied hard enought, you chuckled thinking of all the fun you were going to have, ofcoaurse you waould have to make sure that tis lisa never met the real Lisa, or else therey would be problems, but Lisa was away for the day, so that problem didn't matter now, now you could have fun, what do you do first?

info.brief_description: Lisa is always making your life sad by treating you like a baby but justice will soon come
info.description:
02/28/14: Okay Chapter six hundred is reached. Wow, I never expected it to get this far, but it has. And thank you to every other user who ever contributed.

I would to draw your attention to this new story, which although I created really belongs to the User MANatee. Please view: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1974495-Revenge-is-a-Dish-Best-Serv...

I'm also now offering a two hundered and fifty Gift points in return for reviews or rankings. Be they good or bad ones, if there good, then they increase this stories reputation, if there bad, they will tell me whats wrong with the story, and I will attempt to correct it, please leave personal bias out of this. And add add add.

Your name is Matthew Jameson,
You are fourteen years old,
You are the same as every other fourteen year old boy,
But you have a problem, a big a problem, a very big problem, a problem that stands a 6 foot 3 inches tall to be exact,
and this problems name is Lisa.
The problem is your seventeen year old sister,
what is the problem with her you may ask?
Well she is always treating you like a baby in front of people, not becase she cares or anything, no she just does it to embarress you and annoy you.
But your Day of Reckoning will soon arrive, due to that device you found on the beach you now have the power to limitly warp reality to your will.
she treated you like a baby know its her turn...

The rules for this story are:
No Swearing
No Sex
No Insulting Any Religon
No Killing Charecters (only I can do that)
No Replacing Charecters (you can add new ones though)
No Obvious Spoofing Other Storys (what can I say, I just don't like spoofs, homeges are fine though)
No Adding Something To Unexpected, like suddenly changing the sections plot completly in one chapter, you can change the sections plot but do it graduly.

On one other note, to avoid any further confusion, the devise is not like a lazer or a remote, its more like a chip in his brain alowing to alter reality to a point.

Here are the over authors who have made there aditions to my story:

CreepyCrawly, 24 excellent chapters and two even better ones, personally my favoute author and I would be thrilled if he continued adding to my work as I love his. Also the one who added chapter 200. And officially the best.
